All Classes

Class Description
AnimatedSprite
Class extends sprite, provides methods for animating.
Cultist
Class represents cultist type enemy handles it's movement and ai.
Enemy
Class which describes the basic requirements for properly working enemy object.
Enemy.Direction
Direction of enemy movement in relation to map.
EventsHandler
Static class handling every user's input.
Game
Static class handles running of application, initializing other static classes, map loading, game objects loading, updating entities.
GUI
Static class which handles graphical user interface.
HolyWater
Represents HolyWater item which is used to restore players sanity.
LargeMedKit
Represents LargeMedKit item which is used to restore players health.
PickUp
Represents item which can be picked up.
Player
Static class representing playable character
Projectile
Defines a floating orb which can hurt enemies or player, which gets destroyed on impact
Renderer
Static class for representing 3d scene of game.
Revolver
Represents a revolver player can shoot.
RevolverAmmo
Represents RevolverAmmo item which is used to reload revolver.
Spell
Represents a spell player can cast.
Spider
Class represents spider type enemy handles it's movement and ai.
StaticSprite
Class for representing sprite.
Updatable
Interface for classes which are supposed to be updated regularly in game cycle
Weapon
Interface represents weapon which player can use.
